revised_title: Sir Ralph Howard Fowler: A Centenary Celebration of His Life and Contributions to Science
tldr: This article celebrates the life and achievements of Sir Ralph Howard Fowler, a prominent figure in mathematical physics during the early 20th century. Fowler made significant contributions to the fields of astrophysics and statistical physics, and his influence extended to research supervision, scientific consulting, and advising governments on defense matters. Despite his tragic early death, Fowler's legacy lives on through the many scientists he inspired and the impact of his work on the development of modern physics.
